head.title: A Leg, and a Foot, Up

series.series.name: PULSE: MOTHERS DAY -- GIFTS A MOTHER COULD LOVE

hedline.hl1: A Leg, and a Foot, Up

block.p: They've got kids underfoot and are forever on the run, but Dr. Haushka Skin Care's foot and leg products promise to transport moms from a grueling day of Power Point presentations and Pokemon to a state of podiatric bliss. The Rosemary Foot Balm ($14.25) absorbs excess moisture from the skin and stimulates circulation. The new St. John's Wort Foot Cream ($19.95) smooths callouses, and Horse Chestnut Leg Toner ($19.95), in a compact spray pump, energizes legs with a blast of tingly oils (spritzed through her stockings).
